Witam serdecznie

Najlepsza gierka jaka grałem w życiu, to mogę napisać na całkowitym wstępie gry! Dostałem ją w prezencie i bardzo doceniam ten gest! ( Dziękuje Olu from Kanada ). Nie byłem do końca przekonany w ten produkt, gra zaczyna się przy wyborze postaci i zabijania całej masy potworów... ale...


Setki plusów w której można się zakochać!

+ nie kupuj tej gry bo ona uzależnia jak cholera, zagrasz jedną rundkę i przetrwasz 30 minut? chcesz wiecej
+ masa postaci do odblokowania
+ piosenki wpadające w ucho, melodyjne i przyjemne
+ dużo czarów, dużo artefaktów, broni i łączenia ich w przeogrom możliwości!
+ Sekrety, znajdźki


Nie trzeba za dużo pisać na temat tej gry, inne recenzje mówią bardzo dużo na temat tej produkcji. Jest to gra która zabija czas szybciej niż muchy w kiblu, czas staje w miejscu Ty się zapuszczasz.. nie wiesz kiedy tyjesz robisz się śmierdzący  i obleśny! bo tak ciężko oderwać się od tej gierki!. Teraz czekamy na kolejne DLC które wyjdzie w maju! Najlepsze wydane 8 zł  za DLC w życiu! brzmi to absurdalnie? ale taka jest prawda!,. To co zrobił producent tej gry to mistrzostwo świata!

Man, I just can't understand how this game revolutionized its genre. I hate this game.

The gameplay is slow, boring, and uninteractive, the art is terrible, the music is nothing special. And well.... that's kinda all I can say! There's just not much here, you boot up a run, turn off your brain, and like 40 minutes it's over. And yet, there are people with 20, 80, or even hundreds of hours. How? I legitimately don't understand.

Perhaps I'm judging it too harshly, because this game (and to a lesser extent, Hades) seriously changed the trajectory of the roguelike genre, twisting it from something I loved into something that makes me very sad.

Anyways, other people see something in this game that I do not. So go ahead and try it out! But it's not for me.

Vampire Survivors had me completely hooked from the moment I started playing. The blend of minimalist gameplay and rogue-lite elements creates an experience that's both challenging and addictive. In a world overrun by demons, every decision matters as you navigate through procedurally generated levels, dodging enemies and collecting gold to upgrade your abilities. What really stood out to me was the unique twist on the bullet hell genre – being the relentless force unleashing chaos felt incredibly satisfying. The pixel art graphics and atmospheric soundtrack added to the immersion, drawing me deeper into the game's dark and foreboding world. Trust me, once you start playing Vampire Survivors, you won't want to stop.

Esta es una épica historia que comienza con nuestro querido protagonista Antonio, un otaku mazao, fan de He-man del sadomaso y del aceite para el bronceado, el cual héroe de su aldea (probablemente Albacete o alrededores) sale en busca de Drácula. Durante su viaje conocerá a otros amigos, Imelda una fan de Harry Potter y la alterofilia, Pasqualina la campeona de Frontón de la región y Gennaro, lanzador de cuchillos cirquense fan aférrimo de Conan el Bárbaro.

Durante la aventura creo que no te vas a topar con Drácula, ni con ningún vampiro, pero si con su ejército, que ya os adelanto que con el ejército que tiene Drácula, no ha conquistado Estados Unidos por que no ha querido.

Durante la búsqueda del señor de los vampiros iremos viajando por diferentes lugares, empezando por el Bosque demente, que más que bosque yo lo llamaría jardín sin podar, hay un archivo antiguo más largo que la M30 y también están la central lechera asturiana y una iglesia llena de unos power ranger con espadas de fuego super chetaos entre otras cosas.

En vez de vampiros encontraremos una serie de requilias y de personajes que ya sea en ataudes o con logros podremos desbloquear, entre los que se encuentran un pirómano con capa llamado Arca, un tal Porta que no es el rapero pero tiene flow con esa capa que me lleva el crack, un africano que tira hachas, un viejo borracho jorobado con una gallata que apesta ajo, una monja con cero respeto por el agua bendita y entre otros muchos destacables la tipa fan de Sailor Moon, la cual tiene el arma más chetada de todo el juego, el pentáculo (si he dicho culo) 

En resumen, que el juego va de matar bichos, muchos bichos, demasiados bichos, en serio, que habré masacrado ya el equivalente a 5 veces la población de Brasil y el Drácula de los huevos sigue sin aparecer, ahora los lacayos se reproducen como setas, tienes más armas y reliquias de las que salen en todas las películas de Indiana Jones juntas y aún así se te va a complicar, por que hay más soldados de Drácula que moscas en África.

En resumen GOTY. Cómpralo.

Vampire Survivors: Насолода для Любителів Жанру

Vampire Survivors - це захоплююча гра, яка точно поглине ваш час. Вона пропонує захоплюючий геймплей, який надихне вас зануритися у світ вампірів та пригод.

Однією з найбільших переваг цієї гри є її динаміка. Кожна гра - це новий виклик, і ви завжди будете знаходити щось нове, щоб досліджувати і вдосконалювати свої навички.

Гра пропонує широкий вибір персонажів та можливостей, що додає варіативності та розваги. Ви можете налаштовувати свого героя, вибираючи його здібності та екіпіруючи його різноманітними предметами, що дозволяє створити унікального персонажа під ваші уподобання.

Гра також пропонує велику кількість ворогів та босів, які потребують стратегічного підходу та добре продуманої тактики для перемоги. Це додає відчуття виклику та захоплення до гри.

У цілому, Vampire Survivors - це чудова гра, яка вартує вашого часу. Вона пропонує захоплюючий геймплей, варіативність та безліч можливостей для розвитку вашого персонажа. Якщо ви любите жанр ігор рогаликів, ця гра обов'язково вам сподобається.

Vampire Survivors ist ein herausforderndes und fesselndes Spiel, das Fans von Rogue-like und Survival-Spielen begeistern wird. In dem Spiel startet man mit einem von vielen auswählbaren Chars. Alle haben ihre Vor- sowie auch Nachteile bzw. diverse Anfangsfähigkeiten. Mit diesem Char kämpft man ums Überleben und metzelt sich durch Horden von Feinden durch. Die besiegten Feinde hinterlassen Diamanten. Diese können wir einsammeln, um unser Level zu erhöhen. Bei einem Levelup können wir uns eine von vielen zufälligen Fähigkeiten für unseren Durchlauf aussuchen sowie auch upgraden.

Pro:
- Spannende Spielmechanik, die den Spieler ständig vor neue Herausforderungen stellt
- Verschiedene Gegner und Maps
- Tolle Pixelgrafik und Atmosphäre, die das Gameplay ansehnlich im Retro-Look darstellt
- Die Musik wertet das Gameplay gut auf
- Vielfältige Möglichkeiten zur Charakterentwicklung und Anpassung der Fähigkeiten
- Regelmäßige Updates und neue Inhalte, die das Spiel interessant halten
- Es gibt einiges, was man freispielen kann. Von diversen Leveln, Charakteren bis hin zu passiven Boni, die ab Spielstart greifen. 

Kontra:
- Der Schwierigkeitsgrad kann manchmal, mit steigender Spiellänge je Level, frustrierend hoch sein
- Das Spiel kann an manchen Stellen repetitiv werden. 


Fazit:
Insgesamt ist Vampire Survivors ein Must-have für Fans von Survival- sowie Rougelike-Spielen, die sich gerne in düstere und herausfordernde Welten stürzen, um Horden von Feinden zu trotzen.

Vampire Survivors can be described as a bullet hell action rogue like, and it is a lot of fun. It has simple controls and an interesting artistic style, but like most apparently simple things, this game hides a complex system of weapon evolutions, enemies, and maps. 

Each map hides weapon and items that will improve your chances of survival but expect to lose most initial runs. As most rogue likes, the learning curve can be frustrating but with experience, and upgrading stats and unlocking characters makes the game easier and even more fun. 

For a relaxed and fun experience, I highly recommend Vampire Survivors.

En plus d'être une formule extrêmement efficace maintes fois copiée, "Vampire survivor" est un grand hommage à la série mythique de "Konami".
Je prends autant de plaisir en manipulant des protagoniste de la famille "Belpaese" que j'en prenais à l'époque avec la famille "Belmond"

Le jeu est riche, parsemé de subtilités et de clins d'œil bien maîtrisés. (on sent tout de suite qu'on a à faire à des passionnés.)
- Les musiques sont mémorables et les bruitages parfait.
- La prise en main est immédiate et le concept tout en étant simple, en plus d'être novateur, est extrêmement bien maîtrisé.
- Les animations et effets sont de sympathiques, à de plus en plus machiavéliques et encore une fois parfaitement maîtrisés. Avec en prime, énormément de clins d'œil! (Je pense ici à "Super Castlevania IV", "Symphony of the Night ", et même "Rondo of Blood")
- On s'amuse dans ce jeu, donc on joue vraiment! (J'insiste sur ce point parfois négligé par certains départements.)
- Le système d'évolution est énorme et beaucoup plus intelligent qu'il n'y parait.

Concernant les points négatifs, car il en existe tout de même :
1- Mode "coop" à revoir 
2- Un développement des personnages via une simple description, qui pourrait même s'étoffer pendant la progression, n'aurait pas été de trop. Cela afin d'avoir un petit brin d'histoire. (Ladonna? Belpaese? Pugnala Provola? Mortaccio? Moonspell?...)
3- Je n'ai pas encore trouvé dans quel cercueil se cache le vampire ! =) (Dracula?)

Malgré tout, ce jeu est dans le top trois des meilleurs produit que j'ai découvert sur "Steam" !
Il vous demandera du skill, de l'exp, de l'observation et surtout de la réflexion.

Je remercie le créateur et l'équipe qui en plus, se permettent d'avoir une approche généreuse et bienfaisante. Qui est maintenu tout au long de la progression. (Tout le contraire de ce qu'on retrouve dans un jeu comme Wakfu...) 
De nos jours, je le considère donc comme un bain de fraîcheur.

Il est très rare que je complimente un jeu depuis les années 2010. 
Pourtant, aujourd'hui, en 2024, je lui décerne carrément le diapason "Perfect game"

Pour finir, je pense qu'il serait bien triste de passer à côté de ce chef d'œuvre, surtout lorsqu'on a apprécié les vrais "Castlevania"! (de "Belmont's Revenge" en 1991 à "Order of Ecclesia" en 2008)
Naprawdę wciąga i pochłania czas, idealne jak się nudzisz, oglądasz coś lub słuchasz podcastów w tle. Po zrobieniu wszystkich osiągnięć, polecam grę każdemu :)
güzel

简单记录一下个人主观游玩体验

1、粗略的总评
简单的快乐！简单粗暴快速上手的游戏机制和乐趣让我找回了小时候玩4399时的乐趣，同时还有效治疗了我对肉鸽游戏的电子ED。
2、画面
简单直接的像素画面，但是并不粗糙，重要的元素都一目了然，即使到了后期大量光污染严重的武器特效也并没有很混乱。
3、音乐和音效
其实还行，特别是开箱子的音效还挺带感，但是长时间高强度游玩之后我更愿意关掉声音在后台挂个直播。
4、剧情和叙事
有一点，但不重要。
5、玩法和系统
成功开创了全新的幸存者类型肉鸽游戏。所有的武器会自动攻击四面八方源源不断的敌人，玩家需要做的只是控制移动躲避敌人或捡经验和道具，积累经验升级可以获得新的武器类型或者将已有的武器升级。不同的武器和道具组合还可以解锁高级武器。 不得不说我觉得这游戏最大的爽点在于捡经验的过程，由于大多数武器的攻击范围非常广，而即使配合道具，主角捡经验和道具的范围依然不大，这才给了玩家不断移动获取经验升级提高的动力，不然就成了纯原地挂机游戏了。种类及其丰富的武器和道具，还有大量待解锁的角色，塔罗牌等也给了不断重开一把的动力。
6、优点
船新的生存者类型游戏；如同小时候的Flash游戏一样简单粗暴但是很爽；长期持续更新；
7、缺点
和许多肉鸽一样，某一次关掉后再也没有兴趣打开了，最近沉迷爬塔的我应该不会再玩其他的肉鸽游戏了；

I've played this game for 40 hours and unlocked most of what it has to offer, and I still don't know if I can truly recommend it.  I mean, you can spend all day at the slot machine but can you really recommend that either? Vampire Survivors feels just like a slot machine, with numbers whirring back and colourful attacks filling up the whole screen in an utter mindboggling display.  But there is no story or real context, the gameplay never actually evolves beyond the endorphin rush of unlocking stuff, and I come out of it feeling a bit hollow.  

I find myself wanting to go back and play again, but for all the wrong reasons and I have to not recommend it based on the fact that the whole thing feels slightly sinister.  And look, it would be a hundred times better to buy this game for $5 or $6 and play it endlessly than be trapped in a freemium game that sucks money out of you at a steady clip using similar mechanics.  But can you really recommend methadone just because it's a good way to ween off of heroin?

It's hard to argue against this game being the catalyst for the current popularity of the 'Action Roguelike' genre, combining roguelites with bullet hell mechanics - think games like Brotato, 20 Minutes Till Dawn,, Holocure, Death Must Die.

I feel that, while it's not my personal favourite (that goes to Holocure) in the category, it's a damn good choice for a few dollars. There's so much to unlock and discover, with innovative progression - especially how you evolve weapons and equipment. 

No brainer for the price, and a solid introduction to the category.

[b]KAMGUSTA's mini Review[/b]

By just looking at the screenshots I tought it would end to be one of the many overrated 2D indie game on STEAM. Oh man if I was wrong! This game really rocks. There are a lot of references to pop culture, a lot of unlockables, a lot of levels, a lot of secrets, a lot of weapons (you can also combine them), and so on! Constantly updated. Easy to play and hard to master - perfectly balanced, as all things should be!
As of 2024, simply the best bullet hell shooter on the market and some of the best money I ever spent.

truly the most fun I've had with one hand

Would definitely recommend this game

Pros:
Good price compared to the amount of content. Lots of different things to change up your sessions that you get slowly but surely. The game is definitely addicting.
Lots of characters to choose from
Easy to pick up and learn
Great retro graphics
Kind community (from what I have seen so far), and the developers are upfront+nice as well
Cross platform + cross saves
Items, upgrades, and nodes to help increase difficulty or give a sense of challenge the deeper you are in the game

Cons
The game is definitely repetitive, and it can take a toll. It's not like the grinding is terrible, by any means, but I feel it is notable if you plan on playing for hours and hours at a time.
A small portion of the achievements are unreachable with just the main game alone. If you like completing games, this might be a small downer

Anyway, great time. Maybe I spent too much time, but I don't regret it.

An amazingly run, re-playable game. The core mechanics of slowly upgrading your character into a monster-slaying god each run is highly addictive. In addition to nice features like a beastiary and a steady progression of character, map and item unlocks, this game's core gameloop provides ceaseless fun and enjoyment. There's a reason nearly everybody recommends it, it's just that good.
Absolutely worth it for $5. I got a dozen hours of entertainment out of it, and while I don't think I'll play too much more, I had a blast and will remember it fondly.

Crack (do inglês crack: 'ruído seco, estalo'; também referido como pedra de crack) é a cocaína solidificada em cristais. O nome deriva do ruído peculiar que se produz quando o cloridrato de cocaína é aquecido.
Somente com o uso recorrente da droga é possível ficar dependente dela. Mas a dependência chega rápido, uma vez que acontecem sensações agradáveis quando o efeito do crack passa que o indivíduo se vê repetindo o uso, cada vez com mais intensidade.
A evolução da dependência escala muito rápido e quando os amigos e a família menos esperam a pessoa está passando mais tempo na rua do que em casa, às vezes deixando de comer e dormir em função da droga.
love this  game <3

[h1] Introdução [/h1]

Vampire Survivors à primeira vista pode parecer só mais um joguinho casual. Mas engana-se quem começa a jogar com esse pensamento. O jogo, uma mistura de shoot'em up com elementos de roguelite possui mecânicas de evolução e segredos espalhados pelas inúmeras partidas que você irá jogar, que podem te deixar extremamente viciado já nas primeiras partidas. ( Que foi o meu caso).

[h1] Enredo [/h1]

Praticamente não há! Apenas escolha um personagem, dos diversos disponíveis e, encare hordas intermináveis de monstros dos mais variados. Desde esqueletos passando por zumbis, lobisomens, morcegos e até outras criaturas menos conhecidas. Mas como sou muito curioso resolvi fazer uma busca rápida na internet afim de saber se esse jogo realmente possuía alguma lore e encontrei isso na wikipedia: 

[i] "Vampire Survivors se passa nominalmente na Itália rural em 2021. Hordas de monstros convocados pelo maligno Bisconte Draculó que devastam a terra, e a família Belpaese e outros sobreviventes heróicos se encarregam de caçar e derrotar Draculó. Essa missão os leva a locais infestados de monstros, como uma floresta amaldiçoada, uma biblioteca mal-assombrada, uma fábrica de laticínios abandonada, uma torre sinistra e uma capela sobrenatural." [/i]

[h1] Gráficos [/h1]

Disponível em todas as plataformas, incluindo celulares, Vampire Survivors traz gráficos feitos no melhor estilo pixel art 8 bits. O que dá ao jogo um ar nostálgico e a sensação de que foi um grande clássico do passado, apesar de ser um jogo novo. A medida que você passa mais tempo na fase e seu personagem vai evoluindo para matar as crescentes hordas, o jogo mostra uma quantidade absurda de elementos na tela, o que apenas torna o jogo mais legal devido o caos completo diante de seus olhos...hahahah.

 [h1] Jogabilidade [/h1]

Após selecionarmos um dos diversos personagens disponíveis com armas e bônus iniciais diferentes, começamos nossa jornada em uma fase sem fim gerada automaticamente. Nossa personagem ataca sozinho, portanto não precisamos nos preocupar em bater nos inimigos, apenas coletar as gemas de experiência deixadas pelos inimigos ao serem derrotados. Sim, nossa única tarefa é andar pelo mapa desviando dos inimigos e coletar experiência. Pode parecer uma grande porcaria chata e repetitiva falando assim, mas só jogando mesmo para entender como essa mecânica simples pode se tornar extremamente viciante.

Coletamos uma série de armas e upgrades ao longo da duração da fase e o objetivo é sobreviver o maior tempo possível ou até que a morte nos pegue. Se morrermos perdemos tudo, no entanto ganhamos dinheiro para desbloquear melhorias definitivas para os personagens, elemento esse que torna o jogo ainda mais divertido e com uma replayability absurda.

[h1] Áudio [/h1]

Contando com uma trilha sonora empolgante e digna de uma "caçada vampira" o jogo faz um bom trabalho. Os efeitos sonoros também não ficam aquém, com sons que lembram máquinas de caça-níqueis e jogos da era 8 bit, o casamento entre o visual e sonoro acaba se tornando perfeito.

[h1] Considerações finais [/h1]

Vampire Survivors é aquele típico jogo que não promete nada mas entrega tudo. Trazendo uma experiência extremamente satisfatória e viciante é um jogo altamente recomendado para qualquer jogador, desde os mais casuais até os mais hardcores, pois desafio é o que não falta nesse game. Certamente será um jogo que te renderá muitas horas de jogo devido o seu alto fator replay. E no que o jogo se propõe a fazer, ele faz com primor! Recomendadíssimo!

[h1] Nota 10/10 [/h1]

GGWP!

Really fun game, simple but rewarding and exciting gameplay, very replayable, great art style, excellent sound design, runs smoothly on my somewhat outdated hardware, and if you enjoy the base game you'll probably enjoy the DLC content as well. I don't have anything bad to say about the game itself, but I strongly suggest that you take the photosensitivity warning seriously; this game contains a lot of bright, flashing lights and colors, optical illusions, and is generally very visually intense, particularly in the late-game and when using certain weapons or when playing on certain maps. I don't have epilepsy yet this game sometimes manages to make me twitchy, experience visual issues, and even induce nausea and headaches. I still play it and can easily spend all day playing it, but I now make sure that my room is well-lit, that I take breaks every few rounds, and that I stop for the day if I get any weird feelings while playing. Highly recommend, just be careful.

Ever wondered what it's like to experience a dopamine rush while still being thoroughly bored? The impressive anti-fun stimulator trailblazed a whole genre of games you don't play but still can't put down. For people who feel like Cookie Clicker is a good use of computing power, but wish it wasted your human lifespan as well.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3195689374
[code]
Allen Spielen liegt eine gemeinsame Formel zugrunde:

Zu Beginn sucht man sich einen speziellen Charakter aus.
Jeder mit eigenen Vor- und Nachteilen.

Der bewegt sich schneller, der andere attackiert schneller, die andere levelt schneller, und vieles mehr.

Wie im echten Leben.

Da ist auch jeder auf seine Art besonders.

Dazu hat jeder Protagonist eigene Waffensets.

Dann noch ein Level ausgewählt ... und dann ab in Getümmel.
[/code]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3229350205

[code]
Zuerst läufst Du ein wenig auf der Map hin und her.
Geniesst den Retrolook. Den Retrodudelsound.

😱Oder bist abgeschreckt davon, was Omma und Oppa da vor Äonen auf dem NES und C64 so gespielt haben.

Allzu viel Zeit den Style auszusaugen hast Du sowieso nicht.
Sprite um Sprite,
Welle um Welle
versuchen Dich die Gegner der Map einzukreisen und das Lebenslicht auszublasen.

Wer mal in Tokio auf der Shibuya Crossing oder in New York auf dem Times Square zur Rushhour war, weiss genau was ich meine.

Du brauchst aber auch nur eine Büchse Sardinen öffnen und reinschauen.
Wenn die sich jetzt noch bewegen würden hättest Du auch ein gutes Bild der Geschehens auf dem Monitor.

Also rennst Du dem Mob aus dem Weg.
Schiesst, Messer-wirfst, Feuerballst, Axtschwingst,... Du Dir Deinen Weg durch die Horden.
Sammelst aus Ihren Überresten Deine Erfahrungspunkte und levelst Dich stärker.

Ab und zu tauchen Bosse und Minibosse auf, die dann Kisten droppen mit neuem Loot.

Eigentlich sind so Reverse BulletHell Games so eine Art Diablo auf Speed und ohne Quests.

Als wenn Du bei Diablo3 immer wieder Nephilim Portale als Speedrunversion durchprügelst.

*Das! Macht! Verdammt! Süchtig!*
[/code]

I own this on my Xbox and played it for more hours than I want to know... Why did I need to buy it on PC???? God only knows. Why did I have to dump another day and a half of my life into this game? Again, God only knows. Why do I always convince myself that I'm done playing for the day and find myself playing another "short" half hour game? That's an unimportant question. It will destroy any free time you thought you have in your pathetic little life. It will be your lover, your best friend, your sense of self worth and your only confidant. You'll start wetting the bed in your mid-twenties again. You'll wake up screaming in the middle of the night wondering what fluids are soaked into your bed and pillows this time? You'll lose family and friends. You'll realize they never understood you in the first place and you are better off without them. You'll howl into the moon while eating handfuls of spiders. You'll become homeless and survive off the McDonald's WiFi and power connection. 
10/10 totally recommend.

Поначалу это было весело.
Разрабы доказали, что сочетание маргинального в общем-то геймплея с примитивной графикой может быть веселым и играбельным.
На старте игра была успешной не без причин.

Конечно же, по проторенной ею тропе навстречу богатству и успеху устремились десятки подражателей, неся с собой новые (насколько это возможно в данном случае) и не очень идеи.
И жанр потихонечку развился. В нем, к великому моему удивлению, появились действительно достойные игры (Halls of Torment, Gunlocked).
Порожняка, конечно, тоже хватает (Soulstone Survivors), но умение людей из примитивного и унылого собрать красивое и занятное впечатляет.

А что же VS? Наверное, он тоже развивается потихоньку, хорошеет?
Нет. VS продолжает настаивать на своей маргинальности, бесконечным потоком выпуская псевдоновых героев и псевдоуникальное оружие. Ни одной новой идеи, ни одной интересной механики.

Мне вот интересно, а кто-то вот прям искренне считает, что VS - все еще торт? Кто-то играет в него по своей воле, а не потому что ачивок добавили?

相当经典又好玩的肉鸽游戏，玩法很有意思，自成一派的玩法发展成了新的类幸存者游戏，肉鸽的随机性和割草的快乐都很满足，谁能拒绝在怪堆里游泳呢？而且可以有很多手段来调节随机性，游戏内容也非常充实，音乐也很不错，像素风格比较复古，而且还有各种彩蛋、隐藏内容等着你探索。每一局的时间也很合理，既能充分体验割草的快乐，也不至于太长，就是有点烧时间，每次想着开一局解个成就，打完了又想解个新人物，然后又想合个新超武，本来只想开一局的结果时间半小时半小时的就没了。今天发现居然还在更新新内容，真的是很良心的游戏！
please...stop updating...my 100%...

I have been trying to 100% this game (all characters all maps). I bought it on sale for like $3? Loved it so much, bought some DLCs. What a mistake. Here I am, over 500h, don't own all the DLCs... THEY STILL KEEP RELEASING NEW CONTENT FOR FREE???? I will never finish this game...

In summary, if you have change lying around SOMEWHERE, put it together and buy this game. You won't regret it.

Average cup of coffee in USD: $4.90
-lasts minutes at best
-what if it isn't your usual barista today?
-sh** yourself

VS in USD: $4.99 (when it's not on sale)
-look at my game time, I'm sure I'll opt in to continue suffering for 100 because the brain meats say I have to
-no baristas involved (yet - the content expansion possibilities are endless)
-great playability on steamdeck (portable gaming on the comfort of your porcelain throne)

每每看着击败精英怪后掉落宝箱时中大奖满屏的金光，搭配听着这爽到爆的bgm，真是嗨到不行～～～
游戏有着怀旧复古风的像素式画风，和经久不衰的吸血鬼题材；也正因其本身质量的过硬，致使其在玩家群体之间有口皆碑；
游戏通过极富魅力的肉鸽机制，爽快简单而又不失深度的割草玩法，致使玩家沉浸于其中难以自拔，让玩家真正意义上感受并回归游戏本质，以及最初的那份简简单单的快乐。
——来自小黑盒用户系了不系吧的评价
